title: What's Good? #2 - Perfection
description: What is perfect? Is perfection possible? Is Perfectionism a good thing?

transcript_parts.text: [Music]
hi there
one thing that people really struggle
with is perfectionism
there is a certain anxiety about
situations in which people have
responsibility that makes
some people seem to take that
responsibility
so seriously that nothing short of
perfect will do
sometimes that perfection seems tangible
but sometimes it's just ambiguous it can
be obvious
like two plus two equals four it doesn't
equal five
it doesn't equal three sometimes you can
